name: ThePlus Addons For WPBakery Page Builder (formerly Visual Composer)
author: Posimyth Themes

sections.description:
ThePlus Addons is made by experienced designers and developers to fulfil all your needs while development of websites. It’s completely responsive, easy to use with tons of options. Which makes this plugin biggest, unique and most advance. Plugin is already used by lots of designers and developers and they have given very positive feedbacks. We keep improving plugin so you have the best available version with latest features as per trends.

Below Elements are included in this Plugin :

1. Stylish Accordion : View Now
2. Advertisement Banner : View Now
3. Animated SVG : View Now
4. Before After : View Now
5. TS Button : View Now
6. TP Contact Form7 : View Now
7. Countdown : View Now
8. TP Tabs : View Now
9. Animated Text : View Now
10. Heading Style : View Now
11. Icon Counter : View Now
12. Info banner : View Now
13. Info Box : View Now
14. Pricing Table : View Now
15. Progress Bar : View Now
16. Social Icons : View Now
17. TP Tour : View Now
18. Video Box : View Now
19. Empty Space : No Link Available
20. Food Menu : View Now
21. Breadcrumbs : View Now
22. Stylish List : View Now

  • 5 WP Shortcodes

Fancy Links : View Now
Blockquote : View Now
Dropcap : View Now
Highlight : View Now
Tooltip : View Now

Biggest Collection of Addons For WPBakery Page Builder formerly Visual Composer – WordPress Plugin

Use our amazing free version and for more added features, You can try on our premium version as well.

This plugin is addon of “WPBakery Page Builder formerly Visual Composer”

WPBakery Page Builder (formerly Visual Composer) plugin must be installed and activated to use this plugin. As This is the addon of main plugin.

Live Demo | Support forum(Premium Version) | Support Forum (Free Version)

If you like this plugin, please give us 5 star to encourage for future improvement.
sections.installation:
1. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select ‘add new’
  2. Search for ‘ThePlus Addons’ and install it
  3. Now You will have all options available in your Visual Composer Panel.
  4. Check Setting of plugin to know extra options.
  5. You can start building website using brand new addons.
sections.changelog:
= 2.1.0=
* Compatibility Upgrades
* Bugs Resolved

= 2.0.0=
* BIGGEST UPDATE FROM THE LAUNCH
* Added New Elements with options, Total elements now 22
* Added WP Core Shortcodes, total number 5
* Plugin options panel to on/off elements
* Responsive issues resolved
* Cross Browser compatibility
* Security Bug fixes
* WordPress 4.9.7 compatibility
* Lots more improvements and upgrades
* Turned down some bugs!

= 1.1.0=
* Bug Fixes
* Elements improved
* New styles in pricing table
* User based Updates
* Browser compatibility

1.0

  • Initial Release
